overview: New action and romantic Assamese film. The film is directed by Rajib Dutta and produced by Barnali Hazarika under the banner of ‘Santoshi Ma Production’. The story, screenplay and dialogues of the film are written by Palash Pawan. The film deals with real life incidents. There are some faces that work for the betterment of society, who are concerned about keeping it neat and clean, but sometimes there also exists some faces, the opposite forces, that are hell–bent on destroying it. How two faces can make a change to society by nullifying all the pollutants of from it is the main theme of ‘The Face’.
title: The Face
